clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy of Fixed-doses of Antihypertensive and Statin Drugs
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Trial to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of Fixed-doses of VIENA II in Participants With Hypertension and Dyslipidemia

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of different fixed-dose combination of Viena II in treatment of hypertension and dyslipidemia.

primary_outcome.measure: Reduction of systemic blood pressure measured between the first visit and last visit
Percentage of reduction of LDL-c between the first visit and the last visit.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence and severity of adverse events recorded during the study
